ISSUE BUG:
   (See below script to replicate this issue)
   On regard to implementation: Knuth-TAOCP (1997).
   Select Knuth-TAOCP with RNGKind("Knuth-TAOCP")
   set.seed(0) gives different seed then internally used then (print(.TAOCP1997init(0))


Files (2):
   src/Library/base/R/TAOCP.R
   src/main/RNG.c
#
#PLATFORM USED
#
platform       x86_64-w64-mingw32          
arch           x86_64                      
os             mingw32                     
system         x86_64, mingw32             
status                                     
major          3                           
minor          3.3                         
year           2017                        
month          03                          
day            06                          
svn rev        72310                       
language       R                           
version.string R version 3.3.3 (2017-03-06)
nickname       Another Canoe 

# BUG Replication, Steps below
# BUG Replication
# BUG Replication

# 1. GET SEED .Random.seed
#
RNGkind("Knuth-TAOCP")
RNGkind()
set.seed(0)
#
# Now we show the 100 Uint32 seeds  
#
.Random.seed[2:101]

# 2. GET SEED via .TAOCP1997init

# Using the itial "seed parameter 0" this should have the same 100 seeds
# but it is not, why? (yes I checked the code)
